snippet.title: "Heroic Tale" (2018) ※First Minutes Gameplay※
snippet.description:
“Obsessed with the idea of retrieving a powerful artifact known as the Talisman of Certainty, the King Arthus has called all the adventurers of Albhain. Cajoled with promises of fame and glory, you take your shield and sword and head off to a distant land, where a perilous expedition awaits!”

"Heroic Tale" is available at 
[ KA·IN WORKS - A Fantasy Simulation Project ]
https://fantasysimulation.com/heroictale

[ Itch.Io ]
https://kainworks.itch.io/heroic-tale

[ RMNet ]
https://rpgmaker.net/games/10642/

[GameJolt]
https://gamejolt.com/games/heroic-tale/359466

[IndieDB]
https://www.indiedb.com/games/heroic-tale

[Freem!]
https://www.freem.ne.jp/win/game/19847
